mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(user_id, title, content, love_cnt ,created_at) values(#{userId},#{title},#{content},#{loveCnt},now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from board_tb where id > 0
select * from board_tb order by love_cnt desc
select max(id) as id, user_id from board_tb
SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, u.username, u.id as user_id, b.love_cnt FROM (select * from BOARD_TB where id = #{id}) b inner join user_tb u on b.user_id = u.id;
